column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A------t 12.10 pm on 22 September 2019
column4: there was an outburst of violence inside a KTV along Nehru Road in Depot 3
column5: Toul Kork.------Five to six drunken young men and women came to drink at the KTV DIN
column6: and called the staff to sit down. After some sort of argument
column7: a woman (*probably a staff member)  threw a glass of wine at a guest
column8: and was attacked. She was then taken to hospital.------Local authorities went down to the site and detained the perpetrators for  interrogation and legal action. ------AREY NEWS
